mapper.select: SELECT m.*, f.meetingno, f.amount, f.enabled, fundingenddate FROM FUNDING f JOIN MEETING m ON f.meetingno = m.meetingno JOIN CATEGORY c ON m.categoryno=c.categoryno WHERE f.meetingno=#{meetingNo} AND f.enabled='1'
mapper.update: UPDATE FUNDING SET amount=#{amount} WHERE meetingno=#{meetingNo} AND enabled='1'
